section.section:
If the cooperative is organized with capital stock, the articles of incorporation shall state:
The number of shares of stock;
The par value of each share of stock; and
The aggregate par value of all shares of stock.
A cooperative may not issue stock without par value.

text.section: If the cooperative is organized without capital stock, the articles of incorporation shall state whether the property rights of its members are equal or unequal and, if unequal, the rule by which the property rights of members, including members admitted after the original organization, are to be determined.
